dict.acceptation: 西部电影，西部小说；西方人；

sent.orig: Expression of bFGF and FG-FR, in ovarian epithelial cancer tissue were detected by western blot.
sent.trans: western blot方法检测上皮性卵巢癌组织中bFGF和FGFR_1的表达。

sent.orig: Western-blot analysis with sera against CAV showed the fusion protein had good specificity.
sent.trans: 在Western-blot免疫印迹分析中，3个融合蛋白与CAV阳性血清均能发生特异性反应，表明它们都具有良好的反应性。

sent.orig: Detected the existence of APR-2 through the method of Western-blot.
sent.trans: 兔多克隆抗血清，对APR一2进行western一blot检测。

sent.orig: Effects on the protein expression of cyclin A,B_1 and D_1 were assessed by Western Blot.
sent.trans: Western印迹检测细胞周期蛋白D1、A和B1表达的变化。

sent.orig: Western-Blot assay indicated that the recombinant protein could react with polyclonal anti-serum bovis with good antigencity.
sent.trans: Western-Blot分析表明，融合蛋白能够被牛分支杆菌阳性血清所识别，具有良好的反应原性。
